To the chief Musician<S>5329</S> upon Gittith<S>1665</S>, A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>. O LORD<S>3068</S> our Lord<S>113</S>, how excellent<S>117</S> is thy name<S>8034</S> in all the earth<S>776</S>! who hast set<S>5414</S> thy glory<S>1935</S> above the heavens<S>8064</S>.
Out of the mouth<S>6310</S> of babes<S>5768</S> and sucklings<S>3243</S> hast thou ordained<S>3245</S> strength<S>5797</S> because of thine enemies<S>6887</S>, that thou mightest still<S>7673</S> the enemy<S>341</S> and the avenger<S>5358</S>. <sup>ordained: Heb. founded</sup>
When I consider<S>7200</S> thy heavens<S>8064</S>, the work<S>4639</S> of thy fingers<S>676</S>, the moon<S>3394</S> and the stars<S>3556</S>, which thou hast ordained<S>3559</S>;
What is man<S>582</S>, that thou art mindful<S>2142</S> of him? and the son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, that thou visitest<S>6485</S> him?
For thou hast made him a little<S>4592</S> lower<S>2637</S> than the angels<S>430</S>, and hast crowned<S>5849</S> him with glory<S>3519</S> and honour<S>1926</S>.
Thou madest him to have dominion<S>4910</S> over the works<S>4639</S> of thy hands<S>3027</S>; thou hast put<S>7896</S> all things under his feet<S>7272</S>:
All sheep<S>6792</S> and oxen<S>504</S>, yea, and the beasts<S>929</S> of the field<S>7704</S>; <sup>All: Heb. Flocks and oxen all of them</sup>
The fowl<S>6833</S> of the air<S>8064</S>, and the fish<S>1709</S> of the sea<S>3220</S>, and whatsoever passeth through<S>5674</S> the paths<S>734</S> of the seas<S>3220</S>.
O LORD<S>3068</S> our Lord<S>113</S>, how excellent<S>117</S> is thy name<S>8034</S> in all the earth<S>776</S>!
